meta.title: Geolink Consulting and Services - Geomatics Solutions in Haiti
meta.defaultDescription: Professional geomatics services in Haiti and the Caribbean - GIS, mapping, remote sensing, spatial analysis and more.

footer.tagline: Geomatics at the service of all
footer.newsletterText: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest news and offers.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer a complete range of professional geomatics services tailored to our clients' needs.
services.ctaDescription: Contact us today to discuss your needs and find out how we can help you.
services.contactDescription: Feel free to contact us for more information about this service.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.description: Discover our achievements and projects in various fields of geomatics in Haiti and the Caribbean.

projects.ctaDescription: Contact us to discuss your needs and find out how we can help you bring your project to life.
projects.mapDescription: View the exact location of the project.
projects.contactDescription: Contact us to learn more or to discuss a similar project.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: We are here to help. Feel free to contact us for any questions or information requests.
contact.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.mapDescription: View the exact location of our offices.
